ground_truth: Filter transactions between 2023-04-01 and 2023-06-30, then sum the 'amount' column to compute Q2 revenue.
Aggregate revenue by product (sum amounts), compute COGS by product (sum costs), then compute (revenue - cogs) / revenue per product.
Aggregate revenue per customer, compute average revenue per customer, assume expected lifetime = 3 years, multiply average by 3 to estimate CLV.
